ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] New server?
ygData.msgSnippet: You already get faction hits in PvP on Tallon. However, i really hope this server will be hardcoded teams instead and that we get a chance to use /movelog from
ygData.messageBody:
You already get faction hits in PvP on Tallon. However, i really hope this
server will be hardcoded teams instead and that we get a chance to use
/movelog from Tallon, or that they change tallon to hardcoded teams.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield [SMTP:persona@...]
> Sent: Friday, April 20, 2001 3:55 AM
> To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] New server?
>
> Now that would really work I think.
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: stonemn@... [SMTP:stonemn@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, April 19, 2001 12:54 PM
> > To: everquest@yahoogroups.com
> > Subject: [EverQuest] New server?
> >
> > I've heard rumors of a new server, and that it will be PK w/ a twist.
> > Would the twist be faction hits for whatever type of player you kill?
> > That
> > would be a really good feature, and cut down on all the PKing you see in
> > that players home town. Well, until the guards got KOS to you.
> >
> >
> > Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
> >
> >
> > Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to
> http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
> >
> >
>
